title: Natural Medicine
author: J D Rockefeller
description: Explore the best-selling and newly released natural medicine on Audible. New to Audible? Try Audible free.
text:
Natural Medicine
-
-
Get Rid of Infections and Allergies Naturally and Effectively
- A Comprehensive Guide to Herbal Remedies Used as Natural Antibiotics and Antivirals
- By: J. D. Rockefeller
- Narrated by: Charles Burrell
- Length: 50 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Minor health issues can be treated by using some incredibly powerful ingredients and items that you can find in the comfort of your home. These are what we call home remedies. There are different herbal antibiotics and antivirals that you can find around you. You can actually find some of them inside of the spice cabinet in your kitchen. To take advantage of their antibacterial and antiviral properties, you just need to learn and understand the proper way to use them.
-
-
Excellent Health Source
- By Sevan77 on 09-29-20
-

Overcoming Diabetes & Obesity
- 2 in 1 Bundle - Your Code to Weight Loss, Healthy Life, Stopping Obesity, and Diabetes Naturally!
- By: Dr. David Petters MD
- Narrated by: Jason Belvill, Robert Plank
- Length: 7 hrs and 50 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Are you worried about taking expensive medications for your diabetes? Do you wish there was a safe, natural method to lose weight, and also cure your Type 2 diabetes? There is. It’s not just possible, it’s also simple once you know how. The problem is that most people think that a natural method is some hippie essential oil scam that doesn’t work.
-

The Natural Path to Hormonal Wellness, Part 1
- By: Katarina Nolte
- Narrated by: Julie Eickhoff
- Length: 3 hrs and 24 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Are you looking for natural ways to detoxify and regenerate your mind-body system? Are you interested in taking charge of your hormonal balance? Do you see yourself making your own herbal preparations and meals containing hormone balancing nutrients? Have you ever wondered what our ancestors were consuming to support overall wellness, libido and longevity? If the above applies to you, listen to The Natural Path to Hormonal Wellness, Part 1 and get started!
-

ESP for Natural Healing and Positive Energy with Meditation and Hypnosis
- By: Rachael Meddows
- Narrated by: Rachael Meddows
- Length: 3 hrs and 39 mins
- Original Recording
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
This meditation and self-hypnosis program is perfect for both beginners and those who are experienced with hypnosis. It'll help you tap into your own natural healing power and help you learn how to create healing energy with the power of your mind. Much of pain or discomfort is simply mind over matter, and now you can train your brain to create soothing relief in a natural way, using extrasensory perception (ESP).
-

How to Lower Your Blood Pressure Naturally with Essential Oil
- By: Rebecca Park Totilo
- Narrated by: Adam Naranjo
- Length: 2 hrs and 51 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
High blood pressure, or hypertension, has become a household term. Between balancing meds and monitoring diets though, are the true causes - and best treatments - hidden in the shadows? In How to Lower Blood Pressure Naturally with Essential Oil, Rebecca Park Totilo sheds light on what high blood pressure is, the causes and symptoms of high blood pressure, which essential oils regulate blood pressure, and how to use essential oils as a natural, alternative method.
-
[How to Lower Your Blood Pressure Naturally with Essential Oil](/pd/How-to-Lower-Your-Blood-Pressure-Naturally-with-Essential-Oil-Audiobook/B07BB4C8NR?ref=a_topic_aud_c2_lProduct_1_5&pf_rd_p=e1a087a6-c077-456d-9e18-1d9e4e79d7b9&pf_rd_r=RWP8SCGDFR4G01KH5T1E&pageLoadId=72SyxyOFJVjpLNEb&creativeId=755b9948-eaa6-4ecb-b8b6-a097303f0fe4)

Heal with Ancient Herbs
- Natural Way to Alternative Medicine & Herbalism to Heal Yourself That Could Save Your Life
- By: Paul Simon
- Narrated by: Rhonda Pownall
- Length: 4 hrs and 43 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
You will learn how to produce herbal remedies and how to treat common disorders with this thorough alternative medicine for beginners audiobook. While utilizing herbs may appear complicated or expensive at first glance, this audiobook shows you how to prepare them in the same way you would prepare a meal. Following the recommendations in this audiobook will allow you to customize the qualities of each herb to meet your specific needs, resulting in a personalized approach to your family's health and well-being.
-

Turmeric
- How to Use It for Your Wellness
- By: Kathy Heshelow
- Narrated by: Kathy Heshelow
- Length: 41 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Turmeric, and its active ingredient curcumin, has for centuries been known as a wonder cure for inflammation and many conditions. This book examines why you should consider using turmeric, what turmeric is, how can you use it, and in what ways to improve your health. It includes some recipes and actionable items, references to medical research and concise content that summarizes the subject and gives you action steps and recipes.
-
-
Inflammation Be Gone!
- By Judith on 07-10-22
-

- 13 Healthiest Alkaline Fungi in Natural Herbal Medicine
- By: Blair Berry
- Narrated by: Sophie Wilkinson
- Length: 1 hr and 2 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall

Story
It's no secret mushrooms are widely accepted as nutritional powerhouses by scientists and traditional medicine experts alike. In recent years, general knowledge about the nutritional benefits of mushrooms has become widespread. Today, mushrooms are a vital part of every health-conscious menu, and serve as staples in the keto diet, anti-inflammatory diet, plant-based diet, alkaline diet, and the paleo diet alike.
-

Herbal Medicine First Aid Kit
- The Complete Guide to First Aid Treatment Using Medicinal Plants and Natural Herbal Remedies
- By: Mary Thibodeau
- Narrated by: Todd Mansfield
- Length: 1 hr and 1 min
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Are you ready to experience the healing powers of medicinal herbs? Are you looking forward to creating a custom herbal first aid kit, and using your own, homemade herbal remedies? Then download today to learn how. I know first-hand the powers of medicinal herbs when treating cuts, scrapes, bruises, and a host of other first aid injuries and illnesses. As a practicing herbalist for over 15 years, I have embraced herbal remedies and made them an integral part of first aid treatment in my home, at work, while traveling, or even in the car.
-

Eight Weeks to Optimum Health
- A Proven Program for Taking Full Advantage of Your Body's Natural Healing Power
- By: Andrew Weil MD
- Narrated by: Andrew Weil MD
- Length: 3 hrs and 13 mins
- Abridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
Eight Weeks to Optimum Health focuses all of Andrew Weil's expertise in both conventional and alternative medicine on a practical week-by-week, step-by-step plan, covering diet, exercise, lifestyle, stress, and environment - all of the aspects of daily living that affect health and well-being. He shows how his program can be tailored to the specific needs of pregnant women, senior citizens, overweight people, and those at risk for cancer, among others.
-

Is inflammation ruining your life? Do you wish there was an anti-inflammatory diet that could improve your day to day living? There is! Autoimmune Disease Inflammation Diet: Natural Pain Relief and Disease Control is the book for you!

Off-Grid Projects
- Simple and Effective Methods of Farming, Foraging, Bee-Farming, and Preparing Natural Medicines for Daily Common Ailments
- By: Jimson Lewis
- Narrated by: Ben Herold
- Length: 3 hrs and 31 mins
- Unabridged
-
Overall
-
Performance
-
Story
What does it mean to live an off-grid lifestyle? What type of off-grid farming projects can you undertake? What type of herbal plants can you grow in your garden? How do you deal with emergencies? This book aims to enlighten the listener about a few sustainable and perfect projects for living off-grid. It provides step-by-step instructions on how to start and carry on with them. This guide highlights how you get to know the survival skills you can apply in different situations that you may encounter when you live off-grid.
-
[Off-Grid Projects](/pd/Off-Grid-Projects-Audiobook/B0BC9TTP3Z?ref=a_topic_aud_c2_lProduct_1_12&pf_rd_p=e1a087a6-c077-456d-9e18-1d9e4e79d7b9&pf_rd_r=RWP8SCGDFR4G01KH5T1E&pageLoadId=72SyxyOFJVjpLNEb&creativeId=755b9948-eaa6-4ecb-b8b6-a097303f0fe4)
